The game? 9/10, has some things the devs could work on.
BUT THE COMMUNITY?! A disaster, there won’t be a game where you don’t meet toxic people, that either speak only russian or scream on you.
Would recommend only if you have friends to play with.

This game is a classic, just below the level of games like Portal, Half Life, and Team Fortress...it's essentially mandatory for anyone with a PC to at least own it. Seriously though, it's a very fun game that is extremely well made. The graphics are good, the controls make sense, the gameplay is different enough from other shooters (no iron sights or ADS with most weapons, no sprinting, etc) to be unique and fun...I recommend anyone pick this game up now that it's free (I just wish I had waited and not paid for it...the loyalty badge wasn't worth it).
это хоошая игра но много читеров в мм.

Counter-Strike: Global Offensive is probably my favourite competitive shooter of all time.
I tried for years to get into the game and nothing clicked until i had a group of friends that played consistently. It's probably the most fun i have had playing video games ever in my life.
though nowadays that group has pretty much gone their separate ways due to school so i have to play with randoms most of the time and it's kind of hit or miss.
My least favourite part of the game has to be the lack of updates to the game, they do this thing where instead of updating the game throughout the year they drop a years worth of updates all at once, and the game needs higher tick rate servers...
